title: Meiosis in mammals with 5 answer options

content.question: All of the following are true statements about meiosis in mammals EXCEPT:

choices.label: It serves as a factor in bringing about variation among offspring.
It occurs only in reproductive structures.
It produces cells with the haploid number of chromosomes.
It produces four genetically identical gametes.

content.answer: It produces four genetically identical gametes.
